content:
/>
V.iii.3.5.a
.
Definition:
Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
Chronic fatigue syndrome
is a complex, multisymptom, debilitating illness characterized by physical and mental manifestations.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3 - Infectious Diseases, Immune Disorders, and Nutritional Deficiencies
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section None
